Reviews.Title: Defender
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It is a ok system for you house. When I first got it and started hooking it up it didn't work sent back to defender and had to wait three more weeks. The app. For the cell phone sucks. I will never buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Good quality, ease setup.
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This product was very easy to setup and works great.  I like watching the camera from my iPhone while im away.  I was able to get the mobile viewer and the email notifications to work!!

Reviews.Title: DVR is easy to set up; good for browser- based monitoring on a laptop or PC
Reviews.Author: GoldenWolf
Reviews.Content: This review is just for the DVR and not the cameras.This is an easy system to set up and worth the money. It seems very reliable; I've had it running for several months and it has never crashed.  The web based application for computers is simple to use, provides very good functionality and picture quality (with a broadband connection).On the down side, I couldn't get the phone-based remote viewer to work on my smartphone. Defender/SVAT should look for better remote phone viewing software than the one they recommended in the manual. Including a driver in the program that allows a wireless mouse to work on the DVR would be quite useful.Also, all the informational material that I read prior to buying the DVR suggested that email notifications can be set up when motion is detected - this notification feature just doesn't work. It might matter to you, but it wasn't that big of a deal for us.All this said, I'd recommend this DVR.

ProductInfo.Features:
Access live video footage directly from your iPhone or BlackBerry Smart Phone
H.264 video compression lets you record over a month of footage
Let the coaching iMenu teach you about the DVR's settings and features
Multiple viewing options allow you to connect up to two televisions and a VGA monitor
24/7 lifetime live customer support is available through phone, and live web chat
